Hunter

My main domain

Hunting and surviving in wildlife is where I'm specialized most. If You wanna survive then let it to me.

Fighter

Everybody's got to "know how"

It's not my main domain but I can handle it. Close combat or distance - whatever situations needs. I can do both.

Companion

A little bonus from me :)

I'm pretty good companion too. Don't talk too much, do what needs to be done & take care of animals.
